think-tank.title: Think-Tank/Incubator
think-tank.description: Avi8ted Think-Tank 1 is a DC-based, globally focused think-tank leveraging business for the sake of culture, and never vise-versa. Serving our community as a work-play-live incubator, we act as a catalyst of innovation and opportunity via our startup community and business ecosystem.

features.description:
Culture | Tech | Real Estate

We offer entrepreneurs, creatives, students, and professionals alike the physical spaces, support services, and community necessary to bring their Avi8ted Thoughts to fruition.

Offerings
- Photo/video studio w/ product light box
- Event spaces w/ kitchens
- Private workroom w/ bathroom
- Personal/Business/Community development consulting
- Community

lodging.title: Lodging/Retreats
lodging.description: Avi8ted House is a place for our ambitious membership to grow, connect, make an impact, and have fun. Understanding that creativity and productivity can happen around the clock, we offer private rooms within a beautiful suite in the same facility as the studios and workspaces.

features.description:
Whether a couple of nights or a few months, Avi8ted House allows you the option to stay or live within our facility.
